agents.name: ttft_3_skills_chat_dolphin
agents.profile: 配置3个技能zhipu_search_tool，Plan_Agent, Summary_Agent的对话功能
agents.config:
{"input":{"fields":[{"name":"query","type":"string","desc":""},{"name":"history","type":"object","desc":""},{"name":"tool","type":"object","desc":""},{"name":"header","type":"object","desc":""},{"name":"self_config","type":"object","desc":""}],"rewrite":{"enable":false,"llm_config":{"id":"","name":"test","model_type":"llm","temperature":0.5,"top_p":0.5,"top_k":0,"frequency_penalty":0,"presence_penalty":0,"max_tokens":1000}},"augment":{"enable":false,"data_source":{"kg":[]}},"is_temp_zone_enabled":0,"temp_zone_config":null},"system_prompt":"","dolphin":"/prompt/输出以下内容：我将调用任务计划，联网搜索以及总结技能完成任务...不要输出其他内容。-> welcome
'' -> ref
@Plan_Agent(query=$query)-> plan_result
$plan_result["answer"] -> plan_list
/for/ $plan_item in $plan_list:
  @zhipu_search_tool(query=$plan_item)->result
  $result['answer']['choices'][0]['message']['tool_calls'] -> result
  /if/ len($result[1]['search_result']) > 0:
    $result[1]['search_result']->search_result
  else:
    []->search_result
  /end/
  $search_result>>search_results
  ''->sub_ref
  /for/ $page in $search_result:
      $sub_ref+$page['content']->sub_ref
  /end/
  $sub_ref[:5000] -> sub_ref
  $ref+$sub_ref ->ref
/end/
@Summary_Agent(query=$query,ref_list=$ref)-> summary_result
/explore/(history=true)回答用户的问题:$query
参考信息：$summary_result["answer"]
-> answer","is_dolphin_mode":1,"pre_dolphin":[{"key":"context_organize","name":"上下文组织模块","value":"
{"query": "用户的问题为: "+$query} -> context
